fields.text: Welcome to FreeWire Technologies in the East Bay, where we empower you with on-demand clean power beyond the electrical grid.
For information about our mobile charging and power solutions, press [INDEX].
To learn about our portable electric vehicle charging solutions, press [INDEX].
Thank you for your interest in our portable EV charging. Please hold while we connect you to a specialist.
To inquire about site and utility-scale power deployments, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our grid independence solutions team.
For customer support and service inquiries, press [INDEX].
For technical assistance with your FreeWire systems, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to our technical support department.
For billing and account questions, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our billing and accounts team.
